-- slog.go --
package main

import (
	"context"
	"log/slog"
)

func main() {
	slog.Log(context.TODO(), slog.LevelInfo, "hi")
}
-- translated/slog/slog_gosim.go --
// Code generated by gosim. DO NOT EDIT.
package main

import (
	"translated/context"
	"translated/log/slog"
)

func main() {
	slog.Log(context.TODO(), slog.LevelInfo, "hi")
}
